attributes.action: Just make the right decision for the illegal immigrants.
attributes.additional_details: First of all we have to think about the gdp and economic of the whole country. So the current situation is like so many illegal immigrants are living in the london if u do all the illegal immigrants legal then it will be the best benefit for the United Kingdom. First of all the benefit government is giving that should be by the legal paper so many people talking benefit illegal way. Main things is for the economy and the gdp if that thing will grow up then everybody will think about it.
attributes.background: I just want to tell to the government that everybody has to think wisely and  the economic of this country is now very bad if u make a good decision then it will the great example for the whole country. Because this pandemic situation is so difficult we know that all the uk people is suffering.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567681
